project.name: Multi-Task Project Demo
project.description: Complex demonstration: Multiple dependent tasks building a complete utility

features.description: Create a string_utils.py module with reverse_string and count_vowels functions
steps: Implement reverse_string(s) that reverses a string
Implement count_vowels(s) that counts vowels (a,e,i,o,u) in a string (case-insensitive)

features.description: Create test_string_utils.py with pytest tests for the string_utils module
steps: Write test_reverse_string() with multiple test cases
Write test_count_vowels() with multiple test cases
Include edge cases like empty strings
acceptance_criteria: Running 'python -m pytest test_string_utils.py' passes all tests

features.description: Create a main.py CLI that demonstrates the string utilities
steps: Create main.py that imports from string_utils
Print a demo showing reverse_string and count_vowels in action
Use example text 'RALPH-AGI Demo' as input
acceptance_criteria: Running 'python main.py' shows both functions working
Output includes the reversed string and vowel count
